aboutSection.Title: How it <1>Works</1>?
aboutSection.content: Simply upload a photo, and let RAVI automatically describe it in clear, captivating Urdu audio. It’s never been easier to experience your images in a whole new way!
aboutSection.box1_Content: Select a photo from your device. No hassle—just choose and go!
aboutSection.box2_Content: Our advanced AI analyzes each detail and instantly narrates your image in fluent Urdu.
aboutSection.box3_Content: Press play to enjoy your personalized narration!
